trans-unit.target: 与关联 ConnectionsActivating 事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnConnectionsActivating%2A>方法，将引发事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnConnectionsActivating%2A>

trans-unit.source: Control developers who want to extend the type of connections that can be added to a page could override the protected <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnConnectionsActivating%2A> method and activate additional types of connections.
trans-unit.target: 控件开发人员想要扩展的可以添加到页面的连接类型可以重写受保护<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnConnectionsActivating%2A>方法并激活其他类型的连接。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnConnectionsActivating%2A>

trans-unit.source: Page developers can create a custom handler for the event by adding the `OnConnectionsActivating` attribute to the `<asp:webpartmanager>` element in the page, and then assigning a custom method name to the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 页开发人员可以创建自定义事件处理程序，通过添加`OnConnectionsActivating`属性设为`<asp:webpartmanager>`页上，，然后将自定义的方法名称分配到的属性中的元素。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Creates a connection between two <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> or <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"></xref> controls using only the references to the controls and their specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 创建两个之间的连接<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>或<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"></xref>控制使用仅对控件和控件所指定的引用<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: This overload is used to connect controls when their connection points are sufficiently compatible that they can connect without using a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> object.
trans-unit.target: 此重载用于在其连接点充分兼容确保它们而无需使用连接时连接控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer>

trans-unit.source: When this overload of the method is called, it simply passes the call to the other overloaded version of the method, and passes `null` for the parameter that requires a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> object.
trans-unit.target: 当调用该方法的此重载时，它只需将传递到另一重载版本的方法的调用并将传递`null`需要的参数<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer>

trans-unit.source: When you attempt to connect two controls programmatically, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CanConnectWebParts%2A> method in a conditional check to determine whether the controls can be directly connected.
trans-unit.target: 当你尝试以编程方式连接两个控件时，你可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CanConnectWebParts%2A>条件检查，以确定是否可以直接连接控件中的方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CanConnectWebParts%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control that has the role of furnishing data to another connected control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref>连接到另一个提供数据的角色的控件的控件。

trans-unit.source: A method that serves as a callback method for the connection.
trans-unit.target: 一种方法用作回调方法，以连接。

trans-unit.source: As implemented in the Web Parts control set, this is a public method in `provider` that is marked with a <xref uid="langword_csharp_ConnectionProvider" name="ConnectionProvider" href=""></xref> metadata attribute.
trans-unit.target: 在 Web 部件控件集中实现时，这是中的公共方法`provider`且标有<xref uid="langword_csharp_ConnectionProvider" name="ConnectionProvider" href=""></xref>元数据属性。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control that has the role of receiving data from `provider`, and then processing or displaying it.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref>角色为接收从数据的控件`provider`，然后处理或显示它。

trans-unit.source: A method that connects with `providerConnectionPoint` to receive the data for the connection.
trans-unit.target: 用于与连接的方法`providerConnectionPoint`接收连接的数据。

trans-unit.source: As implemented in the Web Parts control set, this is a public method in `consumer` that is marked with a <xref uid="langword_csharp_ConnectionConsumer" name="ConnectionConsumer" href=""></xref> metadata attribute.
trans-unit.target: 在 Web 部件控件集中实现时，这是中的公共方法`consumer`且标有<xref uid="langword_csharp_ConnectionConsumer" name="ConnectionConsumer" href=""></xref>元数据属性。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> that contains the various information about the provider and the consumer needed for a connection.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref>包含有关提供程序和使用者连接所需的各种信息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control's collection of dynamic collections is read-only.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref>的动态集合的控件的集合是只读的。

trans-unit.source: Creates a connection between two <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> or <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"></xref> controls using the references to the controls, their specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint"></xref> objects, and a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 创建两个之间的连接<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>或<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"></xref>控制使用的控件，其指定的引用<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint"></xref>对象，和一个<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: This overload is used to connect controls when their connection points are incompatible.
trans-unit.target: 此重载用于在其连接点不兼容时连接控件。

trans-unit.source: The incompatibility occurs when `consumer` implements a different interface than `provider` as its connection point.
trans-unit.target: 发生不兼容时`consumer`实现其他接口比`provider`作为连接点。

trans-unit.source: The transformer converts the data into a type that can be understood by `consumer`.
trans-unit.target: Transformer 将数据转换可以理解的一种`consumer`。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> that has the role of furnishing data to another connected control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref>到另一个连接的控件提供数据的角色。

trans-unit.source: A public method in `provider` that is marked with a <xref uid="langword_csharp_ConnectionProvider" name="ConnectionProvider" href=""></xref> metadata attribute, and serves as a callback method for the connection.
trans-unit.target: 中的公共方法`provider`且标有<xref uid="langword_csharp_ConnectionProvider" name="ConnectionProvider" href=""></xref>元数据属性，并作为回调方法，以连接。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> that has the role of receiving data from `provider` or `transformer`, and then processing or displaying it.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref>接收中的数据的角色`provider`或`transformer`，然后处理或显示它。

trans-unit.source: A public method in `consumer` that is marked with a <xref uid="langword_csharp_ConnectionConsumer" name="ConnectionConsumer" href=""></xref> metadata attribute, and connects with `providerConnectionPoint` to receive the data for the connection.
trans-unit.target: 中的公共方法`consumer`且标有<xref uid="langword_csharp_ConnectionConsumer" name="ConnectionConsumer" href=""></xref>元数据属性，连接与`providerConnectionPoint`接收连接的数据。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"></xref> that enables a connection between two controls by converting the data from `provider` to a format that `consumer` can process.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"> </xref>这样的通过将转换中的数据的两个控件之间的连接`provider`为格式，`consumer`可以处理。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> that contains the information about the provider, consumer, and transformer needed for a connection.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref>包含有关提供程序、 使用者和 transformer 连接所需的信息。

trans-unit.source: Connections have already been activated in <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 连接已在中激活<xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of all <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>, server, or user controls that are contained in <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> zones on a Web page and are managed by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取所有的集合<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref>，服务器或用户控件中包含<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref>区域在网页上，并且由管理<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The Controls property does not reference the other controls that are referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control, such as the various zone controls, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls, and others.
trans-unit.target: 控件属性不引用所引用的其他控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控制，如各种区域控件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>控件和其他人。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: This property is used by the Web Parts control set, and in most development situations it is not intended to be called from your code.
trans-unit.target: Web 部件控件集，以及在不应在代码中调用的大多数开发情况下使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: For this reason, although the property is public, it is hidden from IntelliSense.
trans-unit.target: 出于此原因，虽然属性是公共的但会将其隐藏的 IntelliSense。

trans-unit.source: Developers who want to access the collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or other server controls managed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control should use its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebParts%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 开发人员想要访问的集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>或由其他服务器控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件应使用其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebParts%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebParts%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"></xref> that contains all controls managed by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"> </xref> ，其中包含由管理的所有控件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Used by the Web Parts control set to create a copy of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> or server control for the purpose of adding the control to a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Web 部件控件集用来创建一份<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>或用于将控件添加到网页的服务器控件。

trans-unit.source: You cannot call the CopyWebPart method directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 不能在代码中直接调用 CopyWebPart 方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is called internally by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control as part of the process of adding a new dynamic <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or server control to a page.
trans-unit.target: 内部调用此方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件添加新的动态的过程的一部分<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>或到页上的服务器控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: A dynamic control is added to a page programmatically or through the Web Parts user interface (UI), for example by a user adding a control from a catalog of controls, as opposed to a static control, which is declared directly in the markup of a page.
trans-unit.target: 动态控件添加到页面以编程方式或通过 Web 部件用户界面 (UI)，例如用户从控件，而不是直接在页面的标记中声明一个静态控件的目录中添加控件。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The method can be overridden in a derived class if developers want to enable the method to handle additional control copying scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果开发人员想要使该方法以处理复制方案的更多控制，可以在派生类中重写的方法。

trans-unit.source: For details, see the Notes to Inheritors section.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅对继承者部分的说明。

trans-unit.source: When a new dynamic control is added, if it is a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, the CopyWebPart method returns a new instance of the control.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个新的动态控件时，如果它是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制，CopyWebPart 方法将返回控件的新实例。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: If the control being added is some other type of server control (such as a user control, a custom control, or an ASP.NET control), the control will already have been wrapped with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> object by the Web Parts control set.
trans-unit.target: 如果正在添加的控件 （如用户控件、 一个自定义控件或 ASP.NET 控件） 的服务器控件的某些其他类型，已将具有与包装控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>由 Web 部件控件集的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>

trans-unit.source: When the CopyWebPart method encounters a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> control, it returns a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> control with a new instance of the child control wrapped within it.
trans-unit.target: 当 CopyWebPart 方法遇到的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>控件，它将返回<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>它。 内自动换行的子控件的新实例使用的控件</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>的新实例</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>

trans-unit.source: When the CopyWebPart method creates a new copy of a control to return, it also resets the values of all the properties to their default values.
trans-unit.target: 当 CopyWebPart 方法创建要返回的控件的新副本时，它还将重置所有属性的值为其默认值。

trans-unit.source: Note that, if you want to preserve the values of the personalizable properties and have them copied to the new control instance, you should call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.CopyPersonalizationState%2A> method as well.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，是否你想要保留可个性化属性的值，并将它们复制到新的控件实例，应调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.CopyPersonalizationState%2A>方法也。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.CopyPersonalizationState%2A>

trans-unit.source: The final step carried out by the CopyWebPart method is to call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateDynamicWebPartID%2A> method to obtain a new ID for the control.
trans-unit.target: 最后一步执行的方法是调用 CopyWebPart<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateDynamicWebPartID%2A>方法来获取控件的新 ID。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateDynamicWebPartID%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Because the method obtains a new ID for a copied control, you should not rely on referencing a dynamic control that is added to a page by its original ID.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 由于该方法获取复制的控件的新 ID，你不应依赖于引用原始 id 添加到页面的动态控件

trans-unit.source: Instead, you should reference the new instance of the control returned by the method.
trans-unit.target: 相反，应引用该方法返回的控件的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> or server control to be copied.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref>或要复制的服务器控件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> to be added to a page.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref>要添加到页。

trans-unit.source: Creates a set of transformers specified in a Web site's configuration file and adds them to the collection of transformers referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.AvailableTransformers*> property.
trans-unit.target: 创建一组的网站的配置文件中指定的转换器并将它们添加到集合的引用的转换器<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.AvailableTransformers*>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.AvailableTransformers*>

trans-unit.source: The collection of transformers specified in a Web site's configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 指定在网站的配置文件中的转换器集合。

trans-unit.source: Returns the collection of all controls that are managed by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 返回由管理的所有控件的集合<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>在网页上的控件。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"></xref> consisting of all the various Web Parts controls managed by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"> </xref>包含管理的所有各种 Web 部件控件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Creates the set of all possible display modes for a Web Parts application.
trans-unit.target: 创建 Web 部件应用程序的所有可能的显示模式的集。

trans-unit.source: This method creates the list of all possible display modes, not just the display modes supported on a particular page.
trans-unit.target: 此方法创建的所有可能的显示模式，而不仅仅是支持特定页面上的显示模式的列表。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the supported display modes, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SupportedDisplayModes%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 有关受支持的显示模式的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SupportedDisplayModes%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SupportedDisplayModes%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, the Web Parts control set creates the following set of display modes to be used on Web Parts pages: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BrowseDisplayMode> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectDisplayMode> Developers can create custom display modes, either with or without accompanying custom zones that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone> classes.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，Web 部件控件集创建的以下一组显示在 Web 部件页上使用的模式:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BrowseDisplayMode>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode>-<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectDisplayMode>开发人员可以创建自定义显示模式，可以使用或不相关的自定义派生自的区域<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone>类。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BrowseDisplayMode>

trans-unit.source: To create a custom display mode, you must inherit from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode> class, and to add your display mode as a supported mode on a page, you must inherit from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class and override the CreateDisplayModes method.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建的自定义显示模式，你必须从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode>类，也要添加为支持的模式，在页面上的显示模式，你必须从继承<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>类，并重写 CreateDisplayModes 方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode>

trans-unit.source: When you add display modes by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeCollection.Add%2A> method, you should add them in the order that you want them to appear in any user interface (UI) controls (such as a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox> control) that provide to users the possible display modes on a page.
trans-unit.target: 当使用添加显示模式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeCollection.Add%2A>方法，你应将其添加你希望它们出现在任何用户界面 (UI) 控件中的顺序 (如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox>控件)，向用户提供可能的显示模式在页面上。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeCollection"></xref> that contains all the display modes that are supported.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeCollection"> </xref> ，其中包含所有支持的显示模式。

trans-unit.source: Gets a unique value to serve as an ID for a dynamic connection.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个唯一的值，以作为动态连接的 ID。

trans-unit.source: The CreateDynamicConnectionID method generates a GUID value and converts it to a string to serve as the unique ID for a connection.
trans-unit.target: CreateDynamicConnectionID 方法生成的 GUID 值，并将其转换为字符串，以便作为连接的唯一 ID。

trans-unit.source: The method is called each time a dynamic connection is created.
trans-unit.target: 此方法叫做每次创建动态连接。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains a unique ID for a connection.
trans-unit.target: 包含连接的唯一 ID 的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Generates a unique ID for a dynamic <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 生成的唯一 ID 的动态<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls are added to a Web page, they can be static (which means the control is declared in the page markup) or dynamic (which means they are added programmatically).
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件添加到网页，则它们可以是静态 （这意味着页标记中声明的控件） 或动态 （这意味着它们将以编程方式添加）。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: In any scenario where the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control is creating new dynamic controls to add to the page, it calls this method to generate a unique ID.
trans-unit.target: 在任何情况下，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件创建新的动态控件将添加到页上，它会调用此方法以生成唯一 id。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: The method is virtual so that developers can override it if they want to provide a custom implementation for generating the ID.
trans-unit.target: 方法是虚方法，使开发人员可以重写它如果他们想要提供自定义实现来生成 id。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the control for which an ID is being generated.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>为其生成 ID 的控件。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the unique ID for a control.
trans-unit.target: 包含控件的唯一 ID 的字符串。

trans-unit.source: webPartType is .
trans-unit.target: webPartTypeis .

trans-unit.source: Creates a special control that is inserted into a page and displayed for end users, when an attempt to load or create a dynamic <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control fails for some reason.
trans-unit.target: 创建插入到页并向最终用户，当尝试加载或创建动态显示的特殊控件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控件出于某些原因而失败。

trans-unit.source: The CreateErrorWebPart method is called when the Web Parts control set attempts to load or create an instance of a dynamic <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or server control, and it fails for some reason.
trans-unit.target: Web 部件控件集尝试加载或创建的动态实例时调用 CreateErrorWebPart 方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>或服务器控件和它出于某些原因而失败。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The method creates an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> object, assigns an error message to it, and returns it.
trans-unit.target: 该方法将创建一个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart>对象，将分配到其中，错误消息，并返回它。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> control is inserted in place of the control that failed, and its error message is displayed on the page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart>控件插入失败，在控件的位置，并且其错误消息显示在页上。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart>

trans-unit.source: You cannot call the CreateErrorWebPart method directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 不能在代码中直接调用 CreateErrorWebPart 方法。

trans-unit.source: However, you can inherit from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class and extend the method.
trans-unit.target: 但是，你可以从继承<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>类和扩展方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: For details, see the Notes for Inheritors section.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅继承者部分的说明。

trans-unit.source: End users can work with an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> control in a page much like they would a normal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 最终用户可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart>控制在页中很多像常规<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart>

trans-unit.source: To remove the error message, they can close the control by clicking the close verb, at which point the control will be added to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart> object, like any other closed control.
trans-unit.target: 若要删除错误消息，用户可以控制通过单击关闭关闭谓词，此时该控件将添加到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart>对象，像任何其他已关闭的控件一样。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart>

trans-unit.source: If an end user deletes an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> control, the server control that failed to load will also be deleted from the page.
trans-unit.target: 如果最终用户删除<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart>控件时，无法加载服务器控件也将删除从页中。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart>

trans-unit.source: A string that is the ID of the failing control.
trans-unit.target: 失败控件的 ID 字符串。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"></xref> is involved in the failure, the ID is the ID of its child server control.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"></xref>会涉及到在该故障，ID 是子服务器控件的 ID。

trans-unit.source: A string that is the name of the <xref:System.Type> of the failed control.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，它的名称<xref:System.Type>失败控件。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: If a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"></xref> is involved in the failure, the type name is the type of its child server control.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"></xref>会涉及到该故障，在类型名称是其子服务器控件的类型。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the path to a user control, if a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"></xref> that contains a child user control is involved in the failure.
trans-unit.target: 如果包含一个用户控件的路径的字符串<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"></xref>包含的子用户控件参与失败。

trans-unit.source: A string that returns the ID of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"></xref>, if that type of control was involved in the failure to load or create a control.
trans-unit.target: 返回的 ID 字符串<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"> </xref>，如果该类型的控件陷入中未能加载或创建的控件。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the error message to display on the page.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，包含要显示在页面上的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart"></xref> that is inserted into a page in place of a control that failed to be loaded or created.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart"> </xref>插入页面无法加载或创建控件的位置。

trans-unit.source: Returns a personalization object to contain a user's personalization data for the current Web page.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个个性化对象以包含当前网页的用户的个性化数据。

trans-unit.source: The CreatePersonalization method returns an object to contain and manage the user's personalization settings for the current page.
trans-unit.target: CreatePersonalization 方法返回一个对象来包含和管理针对当前页的用户的个性化设置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control manages this object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件管理此对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization"></xref> to contain a user's personalization data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization"> </xref>包含用户的个性化数据。

trans-unit.source: Wraps a server control that is not a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control with a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"></xref> object, so that the control can have Web Parts functionality.
trans-unit.target: 包装不是一个服务器控件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控件替换为<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"></xref>对象，以便控件可以具有 Web 部件功能。

trans-unit.source: The CreateWebPart method is the main mechanism for enabling server controls that are not <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls to take on the same functionality as a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, and thus to participate fully in Web Parts applications.
trans-unit.target: CreateWebPart 方法是用于启用不的服务器控件的主要机制<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件以与相同的功能对其执行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件，因此完全参与 Web 部件应用程序。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: By using this method, developers vastly expand the number of server controls that they can use in a Web Parts application, because virtually any type of server control--standard ASP.NET controls, user controls, and custom controls--can be used.
trans-unit.target: 大大地使用此方法，开发人员展开他们可以使用 Web 部件应用程序中的服务器控件的数，因为几乎任何类型的服务器控件-可以使用标准 ASP.NET 控件、 用户控件和自定义控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control also uses this method in two other scenarios to wrap server controls with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件还使用此方法在两种情况下包装服务器控件与<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: When users add server controls to a page by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ImportCatalogPart> control, if the imported control is not a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, the CreateWebPart method is called.
trans-unit.target: 当用户将服务器控件添加到页上通过使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ImportCatalogPart>控制，如果导入的控件不是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件，调用该 CreateWebPart 方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ImportCatalogPart>

trans-unit.source: Also, when server controls are declared in persistence format within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone on a Web page, the CreateWebPart method is called for any controls that are not <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: 此外，当服务器控件中声明中的持久性格式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>区域在网页上，方法调用的任何控件不 CreateWebPart<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: When you add a server control to a zone programmatically, a typical approach is to use the CreateWebPart method to wrap the control with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> object, and then call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.AddWebPart%2A> method to add the control to the collection of all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls on the page, which is referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebParts%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 当以编程方式向区域添加服务器控件时，典型的方法是使用 CreateWebPart 方法包装控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>对象，，然后调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.AddWebPart%2A>方法将控件添加到所有的集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件在页上，通过引用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebParts%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebParts%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.AddWebPart%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>

trans-unit.source: A server control that is not a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 不是一个服务器控件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: A that wraps control and enables it to function as a true control.
trans-unit.target: A 包装 control ，并使它能够用作真正控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a custom warning message displayed to end users when they delete a control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置自定义警告消息显示给最终用户，他们删除控件时。

trans-unit.source: When a user deletes a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, normally a default warning message is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 当用户删除<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件，通常显示默认警告消息。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: It warns the user that when this instance of a control is deleted, the deletion is permanent.
trans-unit.target: 它会警告用户控件的此实例中删除时，删除是永久性。

trans-unit.source: The page developer might provide users with a way to add a new instance of the control to the page (such as through a catalog of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, or through some programmatic means), but the current instance of a control that is deleted is permanently removed.
trans-unit.target: 页开发人员可以向用户提供了如何向页面添加控件的新实例 (如通过的目录<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件，或通过某些编程的方式)，但永久移除已删除的控件的当前实例。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The dialog box that displays the warning includes a button for the user to cancel the deletion, if desired.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要，将显示警告对话框中包含一个按钮，用户取消删除操作。

trans-unit.source: The DeleteWarning property enables developers to set the warning message that is displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: DeleteWarning 属性使开发人员能够设置向用户显示该警告消息。

trans-unit.source: If a page developer assigns an empty string ("") value to this property, no warning message dialog box will be shown when a user deletes a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果页开发人员分配一个空字符串 ("") 将显示此属性，没有警告消息对话框中的值，当用户中删除<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The DeleteWarning property is not displayed in the case of static <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls and server controls.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> DeleteWarning 属性未显示在静态的情况下<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件和服务器控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Static controls are server controls that are declared within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone in the markup of a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 静态控件是在内声明的服务器控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>区域中的网页上的标记。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: Because such controls are static, they cannot be deleted, so the delete warning message is never displayed in that case.
trans-unit.target: 此类控件是静态的因为它们不能删除，因此将永远不会在这种情况下显示删除警告消息。

trans-unit.source: Static controls can be closed by a user, but a closed control is added to the page catalog, from which it can be added back to the page by a user, whereas a deleted control can never be recovered.
trans-unit.target: 静态控件可以关闭的用户，但已关闭的控件添加到页目录中，从中它可以重新添加到页面的用户，而永远无法恢复删除的控件。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the text of the warning message.
trans-unit.target: 包含警告消息的文本的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The default value is a localized warning message.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为本地化的警告消息。

trans-unit.source: Permanently removes a dynamic instance of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control from a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 永久删除的动态实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>在网页上的控件。

trans-unit.source: The DeleteWebPart method permanently removes the control represented by the `webPart` parameter from a page.
trans-unit.target: DeleteWebPart 方法永久移除所表示的控件`webPart`从页中的参数。

trans-unit.source: Unlike a closed control, which is added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart> control and can be added back to the page, a deleted control instance can never be added back to the page.
trans-unit.target: 与关闭的控件，它将添加到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart>控制，可以在已删除的控件实例可以永远不会添加回页回页上，添加。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > As implemented by the Web Parts control set, the ability for users to delete a dynamic <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control depends on the user and the personalization scope in which the control was added to a page.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> Web 部件控件的实施方式的设置，用户若要删除动态的能力<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件取决于用户和控件添加到页面中的个性化设置范围。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: If the control is added when the page is in shared scope (by a user who has permissions), then the control cannot be deleted by individual users when the page is in user scope.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件添加页面时共享作用域中 （由具有权限的用户），然后控件无法删除由各个用户页面时用户作用域中。

trans-unit.source: Only dynamic controls can be deleted.
trans-unit.target: 可以删除仅动态控件。

trans-unit.source: Dynamic controls are added to a page programmatically or by users adding controls from a catalog.
trans-unit.target: 以编程方式或通过用户从目录中添加控件动态控件添加到页。

trans-unit.source: Static controls are added to a page declaratively in the markup or persistence format.
trans-unit.target: 静态控件添加到以声明方式中标记或持久性格式的页。

trans-unit.source: Because the declarative tags are permanently present in the markup, static controls can never be deleted, but they can be closed and reopened.
trans-unit.target: 声明性的标记是永久地存在于标记，因为静态控件永远不会被删除，但它们可以关闭并重新打开。

trans-unit.source: The server control to be deleted.
trans-unit.target: 要删除的服务器控件。

trans-unit.source: Represents the display mode used for changing the layout of Web pages that contain Web Parts controls.
trans-unit.target: 表示用于更改包含 Web 部件控件的网页的布局的显示模式。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此字段为只读的。

trans-unit.source: The DesignDisplayMode field references a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode> object that is created and contained by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: DesignDisplayMode 字段引用自定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode>对象，创建并包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode>

trans-unit.source: Because this is a static object, you can refer to it directly through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class without needing an instance of the control.
trans-unit.target: 由于这是一个静态对象，你可以引用直接通过<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>而无需控件的实例的类。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: When a page that contains Web Parts controls first loads, it is in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BrowseDisplayMode> (browse mode) by default.
trans-unit.target: 包含 Web 部件页在首次加载时，在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BrowseDisplayMode>（浏览模式） 默认情况下。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BrowseDisplayMode>

trans-unit.source: When users want to change the layout of the page by moving controls to different zones or within the current zones, they must first switch the page to DesignDisplayMode (design mode).
trans-unit.target: 如果用户想要通过将控件移到不同的区域或在当前区域内更改页的布局，它们必须先切换到 DesignDisplayMode （设计模式下） 的页。

trans-unit.source: In design mode, the user interface (UI) for the various zones appears, and users can then drag controls to change the layout.
trans-unit.target: 在设计模式下，将显示各种区域的用户界面 (UI)，而且用户可以拖动控件来更改布局。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Removes a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> or server control that is being closed or deleted from any connections it is participating in.
trans-unit.target: 删除<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>或服务器控件，它是正在从它参与任何连接关闭或删除。

trans-unit.source: The DisconnectWebPart method is called internally by the Web Parts control set when a control is either closed on a page or deleted from a page.
trans-unit.target: 由 Web 部件控件集在页或从页中删除控件时在内部调用 DisconnectWebPart 方法。

trans-unit.source: In such a scenario, the method is called to remove the control from any connections where it is involved as a consumer or provider.
trans-unit.target: 在此类方案中，方法被调用来删除该控件从任何连接其中包含作为使用者或提供程序。

trans-unit.source: If the control is removed from any connection, this method also calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebParts%2A> method to end any connections in which `webPart` was involved.
trans-unit.target: 如果从任何连接删除控件，则此方法也会调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebParts%2A>方法来结束的任何连接`webPart`正忙于。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebParts%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the DisconnectWebPart method is called, it raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting> event.
trans-unit.target: 当调用 DisconnectWebPart 方法时，将引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting>

trans-unit.source: Normally this event can be cancelled, but in two cases it cannot be cancelled.
trans-unit.target: 通常，此事件可以被取消，但不是能取消两种情况下。

trans-unit.source: One case occurs during requests to the page, when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ActivateConnections%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 页上，在请求期间发生的一种情况时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ActivateConnections%2A>调用方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ActivateConnections%2A>

trans-unit.source: If there is a conflict among existing connections, the DisconnectWebPart method will be invoked to close one of the conflicting connections, and in this instance the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting> event cannot be cancelled, because the conflict must be resolved.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有现有的连接中冲突，将调用 DisconnectWebPart 方法关闭之一相互冲突的连接，并在这种情况<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting>事件不能被取消，因为必须解决冲突。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting>

trans-unit.source: The other case occurs when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or server control that is currently connected is either closed or deleted.
trans-unit.target: 另一种情况时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>或关闭或删除当前连接的服务器控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: In this case, because of the control is being removed from the page, its connection needs to be terminated as well, therefore by design it is not possible to cancel the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting> event to interrupt the process of ending a connection.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，因的控件而正在从删除页上，其连接需要被终止，因此不能取消设计使然<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting>事件中断的结束连接过程。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting> event.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control that is to be disconnected.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref>要断开连接的控件。

trans-unit.source: Carries out the process of disconnecting server controls that are connected on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 断开连接连接到 Web 页的服务器控件的过程执行。

trans-unit.source: The DisconnectWebParts method carries out the complete process of ending a connection between <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or server controls, when you pass it the `connection` parameter.
trans-unit.target: DisconnectWebParts 方法执行的结束之间的连接的整个过程<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>或服务器控件，当你将其传递`connection`参数。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: This method is used to disconnect controls when you place an `<asp:connectionszone>` element in a Web page, to provide a user interface (UI) for managing connections.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于断开控件，当你将放`<asp:connectionszone>`在网页上，用于提供用户界面 (UI) 管理连接的元素。

trans-unit.source: When a page is in connect display mode (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectDisplayMode>), and a current connection exists, users can click a button that calls the DisconnectWebParts method to end the connection.
trans-unit.target: 在一个页面时连接的显示模式 (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectDisplayMode>)，并且当前连接存在，用户可以单击一个按钮来调用 DisconnectWebParts 方法终止的连接。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectDisplayMode>

trans-unit.source: You can also call the DisconnectWebParts method directly from your code, if you want to disconnect controls programmatically and without having to add an `<asp:connectionszone>` element to a page.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以调用 DisconnectWebParts 方法直接从代码中，如果你想要以编程方式，而不必添加断开控件`<asp:connectionszone>`到页元素。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> that represents the connection between server controls.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref>表示服务器控件之间的连接。

trans-unit.source: connection is .
trans-unit.target: connectionis .

trans-unit.source: connection is not contained in either or .
trans-unit.target: connection未包含在或。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the active display mode for a Web page that contains Web Parts controls.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置包含 Web 部件控件的网页的活动的显示模式。

trans-unit.source: A page that contains Web Parts controls is always in one of several possible display modes.
trans-unit.target: 页面，其中包含 Web 部件控件始终是几个可能的显示模式之一中。

trans-unit.source: For details about display modes, see [Web Parts Page Display Modes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关显示模式的详细信息，请参阅[Web 部件页显示模式](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class creates the display modes for a Web page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>类创建网页上的显示模式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: Using the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode> class, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control creates several standard display mode objects that can be used on pages that contain Web Parts controls.
trans-unit.target: 使用的基本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode>类，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件创建可以用在包含 Web 部件控件的页的多个标准显示模式对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode>

trans-unit.source: These standard display modes are described in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 这些标准的显示模式进行了介绍<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode>类概述。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control also manages the display modes for pages that use Web Parts controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件还管理使用 Web 部件控件的页面的显示模式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: Using the DisplayMode property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control keeps a reference to the current display mode on a page.
trans-unit.target: 使用 DisplayMode 属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件在页上保留对当前显示模式的引用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the DisplayMode property to switch a page into different display modes.
trans-unit.target: DisplayMode 属性还可用于将页切换到不同的显示模式。

trans-unit.source: For an example of changing display modes on a page that uses Web Parts controls, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 更改使用 Web 部件控件的页面上的显示模式的示例，请参阅[演练︰ 在 Web 部件页面上更改显示模式](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: As part of managing the display mode, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control also provides events and event handlers relating to display modes, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnDisplayModeChanged%2A> method and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnDisplayModeChanging%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 作为管理显示模式中，一部分<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件还提供事件和事件处理程序与相关显示模式，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnDisplayModeChanged%2A>方法和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnDisplayModeChanging%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnDisplayModeChanging%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnDisplayModeChanged%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: These methods provide a mechanism for customizing a page's behavior, and even for adding a custom display mode.
trans-unit.target: 这些方法提供了一种机制自定义页面的行为，以及甚至对于添加的自定义显示模式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode"></xref> that determines a page's display mode.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode"> </xref> ，它确定某页的显示模式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode"></xref> object being assigned to the property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode"> </xref>对象分配给属性为<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the current display mode on a Web Parts page has changed.
trans-unit.target: 当前页已更改 Web 部件显示模式后发生。

trans-unit.source: Display modes are an integral part of Web Parts applications.
trans-unit.target: 显示模式是 Web 部件应用程序不可或缺的组成部分。

trans-unit.source: When users switch to a different display mode on a Web page, the page will often take on a very different appearance, depending on the purpose of the new display mode.
trans-unit.target: 当用户切换到不同的显示模式在网页上时，页通常会采用非常不同的外观，具体取决于新的显示模式的目的。

trans-unit.source: After a display mode has changed, you might want to make certain changes in the user interface (UI), such as hiding or showing certain controls, changing the appearance of selected UI elements, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 显示模式已更改后，你可能想要进行某些更改在用户界面 (UI)，如隐藏或显示某些控件中，更改所选的 UI 元素的外观，依此类推。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > For more information on display modes, see [Web Parts Page Display Modes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 显示模式的详细信息，请参阅[Web 部件页显示模式](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information on consuming events, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关使用事件的详细信息，请参阅[如何︰ 在 Web 窗体应用程序中使用事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after a user clicks a verb on a Web page that begins the process of changing to a different display mode.
trans-unit.target: 用户单击开始将更改为不同的显示模式的过程的网页上的谓词之后发生。

trans-unit.source: Display modes are an integral part of Web Parts applications.
trans-unit.target: 显示模式是 Web 部件应用程序不可或缺的组成部分。

trans-unit.source: When users switch to a different display mode on a Web page, the page will often take on a very different appearance, depending on the purpose of the new display mode.
trans-unit.target: 当用户切换到不同的显示模式在网页上时，页通常会采用非常不同的外观，具体取决于新的显示模式的目的。

trans-unit.source: After a user initiates the process of changing to a new display mode by clicking a verb, you might want to make certain changes in the user interface (UI) by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeCancelEventArgs.NewDisplayMode%2A> property to determine what the new display mode will be, and then changing various UI elements accordingly.
trans-unit.target: 用户启动的过程将更改为新的显示模式，通过单击谓词后，你可能想要通过使用用户界面 (UI) 中进行某些更改<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeCancelEventArgs.NewDisplayMode%2A>属性来确定新的显示模式将是什么，，然后将相应地更改各种用户界面元素。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeCancelEventArgs.NewDisplayMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: A useful way to do this is to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnDisplayModeChanging%2A> method to customize the UI.
trans-unit.target: 有用的方式来执行此操作是重写<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnDisplayModeChanging%2A>方法以自定义 UI。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnDisplayModeChanging%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > For more information on display modes, see [Web Parts Page Display Modes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 显示模式的详细信息，请参阅[Web 部件页显示模式](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information on consuming events, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关使用事件的详细信息，请参阅[如何︰ 在 Web 窗体应用程序中使用事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets a read-only collection of all display modes that are associated with a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取与关联的所有显示模式的只读集合<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The DisplayModes property references all associated display modes, in contrast with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SupportedDisplayModes%2A> property, which references only the display modes that are available (supported) on the current page.
trans-unit.target: DisplayModes 属性引用所有关联显示模式，这与<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SupportedDisplayModes%2A>属性，即在引用有 （上受支持） 的当前页的显示模式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SupportedDisplayModes%2A>

trans-unit.source: Two of the provided display modes, browse and design, are always supported on a page.
trans-unit.target: 两个提供的显示模式、 浏览和设计，始终支持在页面上。

trans-unit.source: The other three display modes, edit, catalog, and connections, are supported only when a page has the corresponding type of zone necessary for a particular display mode to work.
trans-unit.target: 其他三个显示模式、 编辑、 目录和连接，支持仅当页具有相应的特定显示模式工作所需的区域类型时。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you page does not contain an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> zone, the edit display mode would appear in the collection referenced by the DisplayModes property, but would not appear in the collection referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SupportedDisplayModes%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你的页面不包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>区域，编辑显示模式将出现在由 DisplayModes 属性，引用的集合，但不是会显示所引用的集合中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SupportedDisplayModes%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SupportedDisplayModes%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeCollection"></xref> that contains the set of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode"></xref> objects associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeCollection"> </xref>包含的一套<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode"></xref>与关联的对象<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of all dynamic connections that currently exist on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 获取在网页上当前存在的所有动态连接的集合。

trans-unit.source: Dynamic connections are connections that are created programmatically, as opposed to statically.
trans-unit.target: 动态连接都是以编程方式，而不是静态创建的连接。

trans-unit.source: Static connections are created by declaring them in the markup of a Web Forms page.
trans-unit.target: 静态连接创建的 Web 窗体页的标记中声明它们。

trans-unit.source: Dynamic connections are formed either programmatically, or by a user creating a connection using the connection user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: 通过编程方式，或一个用户创建了使用连接用户界面 (UI) 的连接形成动态连接。

trans-unit.source: The DynamicConnections collection, though it is read-only and you cannot change its contents, does provide programmatic access to each dynamic connection object.
trans-unit.target: DynamicConnections 集合中，但它是只读的无法更改其内容，提供以编程方式访问每个动态连接对象。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To perform common operations such as connecting or disconnecting <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, developers should use the public methods on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebParts%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%2A>, rather than trying to directly modify connection objects in the DynamicConnections collection.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 执行常见的操作，如连接或断开<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件，开发人员应使用的公共方法上,<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>类，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebParts%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%2A>，而不是尝试直接修改 DynamicConnections 集合中的连接对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebParts%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionCollection"></xref> that contains references to all dynamic connections on a page.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionCollection"> </xref>包含页上的所有动态连接到的引用。

trans-unit.source: Represents the display mode in which end users can edit and modify server controls.
trans-unit.target: 表示最终用户可以编辑和修改服务器控件的显示模式。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此字段为只读的。

trans-unit.source: The EditDisplayMode field references a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode> object that is created and contained by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: EditDisplayMode 字段引用自定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode>对象，创建并包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode>

trans-unit.source: Because this is a static object, you can refer to it directly through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class without needing an instance of the control.
trans-unit.target: 由于这是一个静态对象，你可以引用直接通过<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>而无需控件的实例的类。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: When a page that contains Web Parts controls first loads, it is in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BrowseDisplayMode> (browse mode) by default.
trans-unit.target: 包含 Web 部件页在首次加载时，在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BrowseDisplayMode>（浏览模式） 默认情况下。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BrowseDisplayMode>

trans-unit.source: When users want to edit or modify a server control, they must first switch the page to EditDisplayMode (edit mode).
trans-unit.target: 如果用户想要编辑或修改服务器控件，它们必须先切换到 EditDisplayMode （编辑模式） 的页。

trans-unit.source: Second, they must select a specific server control to edit, by clicking the edit verb on the verbs menu in that control's header.
trans-unit.target: 其次，它们必须选择要编辑，请通过单击该控件的标头中的谓词菜单上的编辑谓词的特定服务器控件。

trans-unit.source: After the control is in edit mode, the editing user interface (UI) appears for editing the selected control.
trans-unit.target: 控件处于编辑模式后，编辑的用户界面 (UI) 将显示用于编辑所选的控件。

trans-unit.source: To enable edit mode on a page, the page must contain at least one <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> zone that includes one or more of the provided editing controls, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control, or custom editing controls.
trans-unit.target: 若要启用页面上的编辑模式，该页必须包含至少一个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>区域包含一个或多个所提供的编辑控件，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>控件或自定义编辑控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines whether client-side scripting is enabled on the Web page that contains a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，确定是否在包含的 Web 页上启用客户端脚本<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The EnableClientScript property provides a way for developers to disable client scripts.
trans-unit.target: EnableClientScript 属性提供开发人员禁用客户端脚本方法。

trans-unit.source: You might want to disable client scripting for security purposes, or to ensure that all users of a page will have a similar user experience, even if they use different browsers.
trans-unit.target: 你可能需要禁用客户端脚本出于安全目的，或者以确保页面的所有用户将都具有类似的用户体验，即使它们使用不同的浏览器。

trans-unit.source: You can disable client scripting by adding an `EnableClientScript` attribute to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> element on a Web page, as in the following line of declarative code: `<asp:webpartmanager id="manager" runat="server"` `EnableClientScript="false" />` Also, developers could eliminate this property by inheriting from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class and setting the default value to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 你可以禁用客户端脚本通过添加`EnableClientScript`属性设为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>元素在网页上，如下所示的声明性代码的以下行︰ `<asp:webpartmanager id="manager" runat="server"` `EnableClientScript="false" />`此外，开发人员可以消除此属性，通过继承<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>类和设置默认值为`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control set uses client scripting to provide some of the client user interface (UI) and personalization features.
trans-unit.target: Web 部件控件集使用客户端脚本以提供一些客户端用户界面 (UI) 和个性化功能。

trans-unit.source: If you disable client scripting, Web Parts controls still work, but some features are disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果禁用客户端脚本，Web 部件控件仍起作用，但某些功能将被禁用。

trans-unit.source: The ability to drag controls into different zones is disabled, along with the ability to render verbs in a drop-down verbs menu in a control's title bar (the verbs are instead displayed as links in the control's title bar).
trans-unit.target: 禁用了将控件拖动到不同区域的功能，以及能够呈现 （谓词改为显示为控件的标题栏中的链接） 的控件的标题栏中的下拉列表谓词菜单中的谓词。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether client script can run on the page.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，该值指示是否在页上可以运行客户端脚本。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating that the use of themes is enabled on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值在网页上启用了的主题的使用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control overrides the base <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableTheming%2A> property to ensure that it always returns a value of `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件重写基<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableTheming%2A>属性以确保它始终返回值为`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableTheming%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: This is done because the Web Parts control set requires the use of themes to render the Web Parts controls that are child controls of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control and that form the user interface (UI) of a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 这是因为 Web 部件控件集要求使用主题来进行呈现 Web 部件控件的子控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控制的和窗体中的网页上的用户界面 (UI)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: For example, themes are used to render the various zones, and the controls that reside in the zones, including the various types of part controls (controls that inherit from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part> class), user controls, ASP.NET server controls, and custom server controls.
trans-unit.target: 例如，主题用于呈现各种区域，并驻留在区域，其中包括各种类型的控件部件控件 (继承的控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part>类)，用户控件、 ASP.NET 服务器控件和自定义服务器控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part>

trans-unit.source: Although the overridden EnableTheming property is implemented as a read/write property in accordance with its base property, you cannot set the property, because by design it must always return a value of `true`.
trans-unit.target: 尽管重写的 EnableTheming 属性实现为读/写属性，根据其基属性，但无法设置属性，因为设计使然，它始终必须返回值为`true`。

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to set the property, a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果你尝试设置属性，<xref:System.NotSupportedException>引发异常。</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether themes are enabled.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，该值指示是否启用主题。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>在所有情况下。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set the property value.
trans-unit.target: 尝试设置属性值。

trans-unit.source: Completes the process of connecting a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control to another control.
trans-unit.target: 完成连接的过程<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>到另一个控件的控件。

trans-unit.source: The EndWebPartConnecting method finishes the process of connecting a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control to another control.
trans-unit.target: EndWebPartConnecting 方法完成连接的过程<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>到另一个控件的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: It is the counterpart to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BeginWebPartConnecting%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 它是对应于<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BeginWebPartConnecting%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BeginWebPartConnecting%2A>

trans-unit.source: The EndWebPartConnecting method ensures that the personalization object referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Personalization%2A> property is modifiable, which is necessary because forming a connection is itself a type of personalization.
trans-unit.target: EndWebPartConnecting 方法可以确保个性化设置对象引用的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Personalization%2A>属性是可修改，这是必要的因为建立连接本身是一种类型的个性化设置。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Personalization%2A>

trans-unit.source: The method then ensures that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPart%2A> object is not `null`, and finally calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnSelectedWebPartChanged%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 然后，该方法确保，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPart%2A>对象不是`null`，最后调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnSelectedWebPartChanged%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnSelectedWebPartChanged%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPart%2A>

trans-unit.source: The control referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPart*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 所引用的控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPart*>属性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPart*>

trans-unit.source: Completes the process of editing a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 完成编辑过程<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The EndWebPartEditing method finishes the process of editing a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: EndWebPartEditing 方法完成编辑过程<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: It is the counterpart to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BeginWebPartEditing%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 它是对应于<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BeginWebPartEditing%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BeginWebPartEditing%2A>

trans-unit.source: The EndWebPartEditing method ensures that the personalization object referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Personalization%2A> property is modifiable, which is necessary because editing a control is a process that requires personalization changes.
trans-unit.target: EndWebPartEditing 方法可以确保个性化设置对象引用的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Personalization%2A>属性是可修改，这是必要的因为编辑控件是一个过程，需要更改个性化设置。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Personalization%2A>

trans-unit.source: The method then ensures that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPart%2A> object is not `null`, so that the currently selected <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control can change, and finally it calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnSelectedWebPartChanged%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 然后，该方法确保，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPart%2A>对象不是`null`，以便当前所选<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件可以更改，并最后调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnSelectedWebPartChanged%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnSelectedWebPartChanged%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPart%2A>

trans-unit.source: The control referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPart*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 所引用的控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPart*>属性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPart*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text of a warning message that is displayed when a user attempts to export sensitive state data from a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当用户尝试将敏感状态数据从导出时显示一条警告消息的文本<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: When a user attempts to export sensitive state data from a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, if any of the data being exported comes from a member that was marked as sensitive in the source code, a warning message is displayed to the user in a message box, telling them that sensitive data is being exported and providing an opportunity to cancel the export.
trans-unit.target: 当用户尝试导出敏感状态数据从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制，如果任何正在导出的数据来自已标记为敏感的源代码中的成员时，向用户在消息框中，告知他们正在导出敏感数据并提供一个机会取消导出显示一条警告消息。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Developers can mark a specific member's data as sensitive by setting the `isSensitive` parameter of the `[Personalizable]` attribute to `true` on the member.
trans-unit.target: 开发人员可以通过设置标记为敏感的特定成员的数据`isSensitive`参数`[Personalizable]`属性设为`true`成员上。

trans-unit.source: For more information about this attribute and parameter, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute> class.
trans-unit.target: 有关此属性和参数的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute>类。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > When you use the export feature of Web Parts, sensitive data could potentially be exported to unauthorized users.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!IMPORTANT]&1;> 时使用 Web 部件的导出功能，敏感数据可能无法导出到未经授权的用户。

trans-unit.source: For details on how to protect against this threat, see [Securing Web Parts Pages](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何防范此威胁的详细信息，请参阅[保护 Web 部件页](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The default message is displayed whenever users attempt to export.
trans-unit.target: 每当用户尝试导出，将显示默认消息。

trans-unit.source: However, by assigning a value to the ExportSensitiveDataWarning property, you can provide a custom warning message.
trans-unit.target: 但是，通过向 ExportSensitiveDataWarning 属性分配一个值，你可以提供自定义的警告消息。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the warning message.
trans-unit.target: 包含警告消息的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The default message is a culture-specific value supplied by the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 默认消息是由.NET Framework 提供的区域性特定值。

trans-unit.source: Creates an XML description file that contains state and property data for a server control.
trans-unit.target: 创建包含的服务器控件的状态和属性数据的 XML 说明文件。

trans-unit.source: The ExportWebPart method assembles various state and property data from `webPart` into an XML file.
trans-unit.target: ExportWebPart 方法将从各种状态和属性的数据组合`webPart`到 XML 文件。

trans-unit.source: The data includes information about the control itself, including its assembly, state data, and property data.
trans-unit.target: 数据包括有关控件本身，包括程序集、 状态数据和属性数据的信息。

trans-unit.source: The user who initiates the export can save the XML file to disk on the local computer or the network.
trans-unit.target: 启动导出的用户可以将 XML 文件保存到磁盘中，本地计算机或网络上。

trans-unit.source: Other users can then import the description file to a different page or Web site, and apply the state and property data to a different instance of `webPart`.
trans-unit.target: 然后，其他用户可以说明文件导入到另一个页面或网站，并将状态和属性数据应用到的其他实例`webPart`。

trans-unit.source: This provides a fast and convenient mechanism for users to share and reuse their settings on server controls, and it also provides developers with a means to control the appearance and behavior of exported and imported controls.
trans-unit.target: 这样，用户可以共享并重复使用其服务器控件上的设置快速而方便的机制和它还为开发人员提供一种控制的外观和行为的导出和导入控件的方法。

trans-unit.source: Properties on `webPart` are not exported by default.
trans-unit.target: 上的属性`webPart`不导出的默认值。

trans-unit.source: To enable export of a property, you must mark it with the `[Personalizable]` attribute in the source code.
trans-unit.target: 若要启用导出的属性，必须将其与标记`[Personalizable]`的源代码中的属性。

trans-unit.source: You can also optionally mark an exportable property as containing sensitive data, by setting the `isSensitive` parameter of the `[Personalizable]` attribute to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 也可以将标记为包含敏感数据，通过设置可导出属性`isSensitive`参数`[Personalizable]`属性设为`true`。

trans-unit.source: By default, `isSensitive` is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，`isSensitive`是`false`。

trans-unit.source: Developers can set the parameter to `true` to indicate that the data is sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 开发人员可以将参数设置为`true`以指示数据是敏感。
