trans-unit.source: To enable `webPart` to be exported, a developer sets its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ExportMode%2A> property value to either <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartExportMode> (which includes all personalizable and sensitive properties), or to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartExportMode>, which exports everything except for sensitive properties.
trans-unit.target: 若要启用`webPart`要导出，开发人员设置其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ExportMode%2A>属性值为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartExportMode>（包括所有可个性化和敏感属性） 或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartExportMode>，导出敏感属性除。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartExportMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartExportMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ExportMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Allowing users to export data from controls, and to import data into other controls, entails some security risks.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!IMPORTANT]&1;> 允许用户将数据导出从控件，并将数据导入其他控件，需要某些安全风险。

trans-unit.source: Developers should use the approach discussed above to protect sensitive data, and if they want to avoid the risk of exposing data altogether, they should not enable export on `webPart` at all.
trans-unit.target: 开发人员应使用前面讨论方法来保护敏感数据，并且如果他们想要避免完全公开数据的风险，它们不使导出上`webPart`根本。

trans-unit.source: For details on Web Parts security issues, see [Securing Web Parts Pages](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关 Web 部件安全问题的详细信息，请参阅[保护 Web 部件页](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The control from which data will be exported.
trans-unit.target: 将从其导出数据控件。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> that writes the exported data from `webPart` to an XML description file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>，它将从导出的数据写入`webPart`XML 说明文件。</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: Overridden to prevent focus from ever being set on the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control, because it has no user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: 重写，以防止将焦点设置在<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>控制，因为它有没有用户界面 (UI)。

trans-unit.source: The Focus method overrides the base <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Focus%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, and throws an exception if a caller calls the method.
trans-unit.target: 焦点方法重写基<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Focus%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法，并在调用方调用的方法时引发异常。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Focus%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control has no UI and is never visible to users, it can never allow focus to be set on itself.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件没有用户界面，并且是永远不会对用户可见，则它从不允许将焦点设置在本身上。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: A caller tries to call the Focus method, which is not supported in a control that has no UI.
trans-unit.target: 调用方尝试调用不支持没有用户界面的控件中的焦点方法。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint"></xref> objects that can act as connection points from a server control that is acting as a consumer within a Web Parts connection.
trans-unit.target: 检索的集合<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint"></xref>可以充当从服务器的连接点的对象，它是控制作为 Web 部件连接中的使用者。

trans-unit.source: A Web Parts connection always involves exactly two controls, one acting as the provider of data, the other acting as the consumer of data.
trans-unit.target: Web 部件连接中始终涉及两个控件，一个充当数据，另一个充当数据的使用者的提供程序。

trans-unit.source: Each control must have one or more methods that are defined as connection points.
trans-unit.target: 每个控件必须具有一个或多个定义为连接点的方法。

trans-unit.source: In the case of a consumer control, its connection points are <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint> objects.
trans-unit.target: 对于使用者控件，其连接点为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint>

trans-unit.source: Retrieving the consumer connection points is a necessary step in forming a Web Parts connection.
trans-unit.target: 检索使用者连接点是构成 Web 部件连接中的必需步骤。

trans-unit.source: A consumer must always have at least one connection point to be able to establish a connection.
trans-unit.target: 使用者必须始终具有至少一个连接点，若要能够建立连接。

trans-unit.source: The GetConsumerConnectionPoints method checks a consumer control and retrieves a collection of all its connection points.
trans-unit.target: GetConsumerConnectionPoints 方法检查使用者控件，并检索其所有连接点的集合。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control has no connection points, the method returns an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件具有没有连接点，该方法返回一个空集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: A server control that is acting as a consumer in a connection.
trans-unit.target: 一个充当使用者连接中的服务器控件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPointCollection"></xref> that contains all connection points in the consumer.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPointCollection"> </xref> ，其中包含使用者中的所有连接点。

trans-unit.source: webPart is .
trans-unit.target: webPartis .

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a reference to the current instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control on a page.
trans-unit.target: 检索的当前实例的引用<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>页上的控件。

trans-unit.source: The GetCurrentWebPartManager method is useful in contexts where you want to retrieve a reference to the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: GetCurrentWebPartManager 方法是在上下文中有用你想要检索对当前的引用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: A common scenario where this would occur is if you are writing a custom control that cannot know during development what the ID of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control on its page will be.
trans-unit.target: 出现这种常用情况是如果你正在编写的自定义控件在开发过程的 ID 不能知道<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件置于其上将。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The GetCurrentWebPartManager method is static, so you can call it directly without needing an instance of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> GetCurrentWebPartManager 方法是静态的因此您可以直接无的实例调用它<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: Some controls in the Web Parts control set, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, have a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.WebPartManager%2A> property that can retrieve a reference to the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: Web 部件中的某些控件控件集，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件，具有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.WebPartManager%2A>可以检索对当前的引用的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.WebPartManager%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Hence, when working with such controls, you should use this property to retrieve a reference.
trans-unit.target: 因此，在使用此类控件，你应使用此属性来检索的引用。

trans-unit.source: If you are coding in a context where you know the ID of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control, such as writing code inline within a Web page, it is simplest and most efficient to refer directly to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control by using its ID.
trans-unit.target: 如果你在编码在其中你知道的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控制，例如编写内联代码在 Web 页中，它是最简单和直接引用的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>id 的控制</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>方式效率最高</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>ID 的上下文中

trans-unit.source: The Web page that contains an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 包含的实例的 Web 页<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> that references the current instance of the control on a page.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref>引用页面上的控件的当前实例。

trans-unit.source: page is .
trans-unit.target: pageis .

trans-unit.source: Gets a string containing the value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.DisplayTitle*> property of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取包含的值的字符串<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.DisplayTitle*>属性<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.DisplayTitle*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the calculated value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.DisplayTitle%2A> property for `webPart`.
trans-unit.target: 获取的计算所得的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.DisplayTitle%2A>属性`webPart`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.DisplayTitle%2A>

trans-unit.source: When developers do not assign a value to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, this method produces the value to display as the title.
trans-unit.target: 当开发人员不将值赋给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件，此方法产生的值显示为标题。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A>

trans-unit.source: The calculated value for untitled controls consists of a number appended to a string, with the number indicating a control's sequence within the current zone.
trans-unit.target: 无标题控件的计算的值包含，该值指示在当前区域内的控件的序列号为一个字符串，后面追加一个数字。

trans-unit.source: The control for which the method returns the value of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.DisplayTitle*>.
trans-unit.target: 控件，该方法返回的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.DisplayTitle*>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.DisplayTitle*>值

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the calculated value of for webPart.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，包含的计算所得的值为 webPart 。

trans-unit.source: webPart is .
trans-unit.target: webPartis .

trans-unit.source: webPart is not in the collection.
trans-unit.target: webPart不在集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets the relative virtual path and the query string that are part of the request when a user attempts to export a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取相对虚拟路径和查询字符串的请求的一部分时用户尝试导出<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The value returned by the GetExportUrl method is a relative virtual path to the server location of the page that contains the control, plus the appended query string value that forms the export request submitted to the server.
trans-unit.target: GetExportUrl 方法返回的值是指向包含该控件的页以及窗体导出请求提交到服务器的追加的查询字符串值的服务器位置的相对虚拟路径。

trans-unit.source: The GetExportUrl method encodes the string before allowing the request to be submitted, to protect against malicious script attacks.
trans-unit.target: GetExportUrl 方法再允许提交，以防止恶意脚本攻击的请求编码字符串。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > For more information about securing Web Parts applications, see [Securing Web Parts Pages](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 有关保护 Web 部件应用程序的详细信息，请参阅[保护 Web 部件页](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> that is being exported.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref>正在导出。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the relative virtual path and the query string that together form the request to export a control.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，包含了相对虚拟路径和查询字符串共同形成导出控件的请求。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"></xref> control that contains a server control.
trans-unit.target: 获取到的实例的引用<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"></xref>包含服务器控件的控件。

trans-unit.source: In general, there are two categories of controls that developers place in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zones to participate in Web Parts applications: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, which inherit from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> base class, and other server controls, which can be standard ASP.NET controls, custom controls, or user controls.
trans-unit.target: 一般情况下，有两种类别的控件的开发人员放在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>区域，以参与 Web 部件应用程序︰<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件，继承自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>基类和其他服务器控件，它可以是标准 ASP.NET 控件、 自定义控件或用户控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: When any of these controls is placed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone, it takes on the functionality of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 当任何这些控件将置于<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>区域，它将的功能<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control has this functionality inherently, but the other kinds of server controls do not.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件具有此功能本质上就是，但其他类型的服务器控件不这样做。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: To enable the other server controls to act as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls when they are placed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone, ASP.NET wraps them with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要启用其他服务器控件，使其作为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制当它们都将置于<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>区域，ASP.NET 包装它们与<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> control inherits directly from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class, it provides its child controls with true Web Parts features.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>控件继承直接从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>类，它为其子控件提供 true Web 部件功能。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>

trans-unit.source: Often at run time, page developers might want to get a reference to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> control that contains one of the server controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: 通常在运行时，页开发人员可能想要获取对引用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>包含一个区域中的服务器控件的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>

trans-unit.source: The GetGenericWebPart method enables them to retrieve a reference to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: GetGenericWebPart 方法使它们能够检索到的引用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>

trans-unit.source: A server control that exists in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> and is wrapped as a child control of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"></xref> at run time.
trans-unit.target: 中存在的服务器控件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref>和包装为子控件的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"></xref>在运行时。

trans-unit.source: A that wraps control as a child control.
trans-unit.target: A 包装 control 为子控件。

trans-unit.source: The method returns if control is not contained in a .
trans-unit.target: 该方法返回如果 control 未包含在 。

trans-unit.source: control is .
trans-unit.target: controlis .

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint"></xref> objects that can act as connection points from a server control that is acting as a provider within a Web Parts connection.
trans-unit.target: 检索的集合<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint"></xref>可以充当从服务器的连接点的对象，它是控制作为 Web 部件连接中的提供者。

trans-unit.source: A Web Parts connection always involves exactly two controls, one acting as the provider of data, the other acting as the consumer of data.
trans-unit.target: Web 部件连接中始终涉及两个控件，一个充当数据，另一个充当数据的使用者的提供程序。

trans-unit.source: Each control must have one or more methods that are defined as connection points.
trans-unit.target: 每个控件必须具有一个或多个定义为连接点的方法。

trans-unit.source: In the case of a provider control, its connection points are <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint> objects.
trans-unit.target: 对于提供程序控件，其连接点为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint>

trans-unit.source: A provider must always have at least one connection point to be able to establish a connection.
trans-unit.target: 一个提供程序必须始终具有至少一个连接点，若要能够建立连接。

trans-unit.source: The GetProviderConnectionPoints method checks a provider control and retrieves a collection of all its connection points.
trans-unit.target: GetProviderConnectionPoints 方法检查提供程序控制并检索其所有连接点的集合。

trans-unit.source: Retrieving the provider connection points is a necessary step in forming a Web Parts connection.
trans-unit.target: 检索提供程序连接点是构成 Web 部件连接中的必需步骤。

trans-unit.source: A server control that is acting as a provider in a connection.
trans-unit.target: 一个充当提供程序连接中的服务器控件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPointCollection"></xref> that contains all connection points in the provider.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPointCollection"> </xref> ，其中包含提供程序中的所有连接点。

trans-unit.source: webPart is .
trans-unit.target: webPartis .

trans-unit.source: Imports an XML description file that contains state and property data for a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control, and applies the data to the control.
trans-unit.target: 导入包含状态和属性数据的 XML 说明文件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控制，并将数据应用到控件。

trans-unit.source: The ImportWebPart method imports an XML description file that was created by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ExportWebPart%2A> method for a server control.
trans-unit.target: ImportWebPart 方法导入由 XML 说明文件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ExportWebPart%2A>的服务器控件的方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ExportWebPart%2A>

trans-unit.source: It is not the actual server control that is imported, but only the description file containing state and property data about the control.
trans-unit.target: 它不是导入，则实际的服务器控件，但仅包含有关控件的状态和属性数据的说明文件。

trans-unit.source: The control and assembly referenced in the description file must already be available on the server where a user attempts to import the description file.
trans-unit.target: 控件和说明文件中引用的程序集必须已经是用户尝试导入说明文件服务器上可用。

trans-unit.source: To enable importing a control, a developer needs to add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone> control on the page where import will be enabled.
trans-unit.target: 若要启用导入一个控件，开发人员需要添加<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone>将在何处启用导入的页上的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone>

trans-unit.source: Within the zone, an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ImportCatalogPart> control must be added.
trans-unit.target: 在该区域，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ImportCatalogPart>必须添加控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ImportCatalogPart>

trans-unit.source: This control provides a file dialog box that allows users to browse and locate the description file to import.
trans-unit.target: 此控件提供一个文件对话框，允许用户浏览并找到要导入的说明文件。

trans-unit.source: After a user finds a description file and begins the import, the description file is read by the ImportWebPart method.
trans-unit.target: 在用户查找的描述文件，并开始导入后，由 ImportWebPart 方法读取说明文件。

trans-unit.source: If there are no errors and if the assembly and control are found, the server control is added to the catalog within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ImportCatalogPart> control, and the various property and state data specified in the description file are applied to the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有错误，并且如果找到的程序集和控件，将服务器控件添加到目录中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ImportCatalogPart>控制和说明文件中指定的各种属性和状态数据应用于控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ImportCatalogPart>

trans-unit.source: The user can then select the control and add it to the page.
trans-unit.target: 然后，用户可以选择的控件，并将其添加到页面。

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Like the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ExportWebPart%2A> method, the ImportWebPart method has some potential for security risks.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!IMPORTANT]&1;> 如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ExportWebPart%2A>方法，ImportWebPart 方法有一些潜在的安全风险。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ExportWebPart%2A>

trans-unit.source: Because it involves importing data into a Web site, a malicious user could try to insert bad data or even script code into the description file that is imported.
trans-unit.target: 因为它涉及到将数据导入网站，恶意用户可能尝试插入到说明文件导入的错误数据或甚至脚本代码。

trans-unit.source: Then the bad data could appear on a page, or in a database, or the inserted script could run.
trans-unit.target: 然后将错误数据无法显示页面，或在数据库中，或插入的脚本无法运行。

trans-unit.source: For an overview of the potential risks associated with importing description files, and ways of avoiding those risks, see [Securing Web Parts Pages](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 与导入描述文件，以及避免这些风险的方法关联的潜在风险的概述，请参阅[保护 Web 部件页](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> that reads the state and property data from the XML description file that is being imported.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>，从要导入的 XML 说明文件中读取的状态和属性数据。</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that is displayed to the user if an error is encountered during import.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>，将向用户显示如果导入过程中遇到错误。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> (or a server control that is wrapped by a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"></xref> and thus treated as a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>) that is referenced in the imported XML description file.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> (或由包装的服务器控件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"> </xref> ，因此会视为<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref>) 导入的 XML 说明文件中引用。

trans-unit.source: reader is .
trans-unit.target: readeris .

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals"></xref> class, which is used to combine and separate a set of methods that are actually implemented in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> class, but are mostly useful for control developers.
trans-unit.target: 获取对<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals"></xref>类，该类用于合并和拆分中实际实现的方法的一组<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>类，但通常用于控件开发人员。

trans-unit.source: The Internals property exposes the APIs to call into a set of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> methods that are used mostly in extensibility cases.
trans-unit.target: 内部属性公开的 Api 来调入一组<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>主要用于扩展性用例的方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: The designed way to use these internal methods is to access them through the Internals property.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用这些内部的方法的设计的方法是通过内部属性访问它们。

trans-unit.source: Because the property is protected, you can only access it and call the methods within an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> class by inheriting from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class.
trans-unit.target: 由于受保护属性，你仅可以访问它并调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals>通过从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>类</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>继承的类</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals>的实例内的方法

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property is hidden from IntelliSense in [!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 此属性隐藏的中的 IntelliSense [!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: However, in a derived <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class, you can still access the property and its various members.
trans-unit.target: 但是，在派生<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>类，则仍可以访问的属性，其不同的成员。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals"></xref>, through which a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> can reference the various methods that have been separated into the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals"> </xref>，通过该<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>可以引用被分隔成的各种方法<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Carries out the initial steps in determining whether a control is authorized to be added to a page.
trans-unit.target: 确定控件是否有权添加到页面中的初始步骤将执行。

trans-unit.source: The IsAuthorized method is the initial method called by the Web Parts control set to check authorization for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: IsAuthorized 方法是调用 Web 部件控件集用来检查授权的初始方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: It accepts `webPart` as a parameter, and begins a process that ultimately determines whether the control will be added to a page.
trans-unit.target: 它接受`webPart`作为参数，并开始最终确定是否将控件添加到页的过程。

trans-unit.source: Call this method from your code directly when you need to determine whether a given control is authorized.
trans-unit.target: 此方法在代码中直接调用需要以确定是否授权给定的控件时。

trans-unit.source: This method carries out the initial tasks of determining whether the control inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class or is a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> control and, if so, what type of child control it contains.
trans-unit.target: 此方法执行初始任务确定控件是否继承自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>类或者是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>控制，并且，如果是这样，哪种类型的子控制它包含。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: To finish the task of authorization, it calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized%28System.Type%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29> overload method.
trans-unit.target: 若要完成的任务的授权，它调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized%28System.Type%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29>重载方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized%28System.Type%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> or other server control being checked for authorization.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref>或正在接受授权检查其他服务器控件。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether webPart can be added to a page.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，该值指示是否 webPart 可以添加到页。

trans-unit.source: webPart is .
trans-unit.target: webPartis .

trans-unit.source: Carries out the final steps in determining whether a control is authorized to be added to a page.
trans-unit.target: 确定控件是否有权添加到页面中的最后步骤执行。

trans-unit.source: The IsAuthorized overload method carries out the final steps in determining whether a control is authorized to be added to a page.
trans-unit.target: 确定控件是否有权添加到页面中的最后步骤执行 IsAuthorized 重载方法。

trans-unit.source: The method ensures that `type` is a valid type, and that `path` has a value only if the control being checked is a user control.
trans-unit.target: 该方法确保`type`是有效的类型，而`path`被检查的控件是一个用户控件的情况下，才会包含一个值。

trans-unit.source: Then it calls the critical <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnAuthorizeWebPart%2A> method, which raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.AuthorizeWebPart> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它调用的重要<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnAuthorizeWebPart%2A>方法，将引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.AuthorizeWebPart>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.AuthorizeWebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnAuthorizeWebPart%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the control being checked for authorization.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>的控件进行授权检查。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The relative application path to the source file for the control being authorized, if the control is a user control.
trans-unit.target: 被授权，如果控件是一个用户控件的控件的源文件相对的应用程序路径。

trans-unit.source: An arbitrary string value assigned to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter*> property of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control, used to authorize whether a control can be added to a page.
trans-unit.target: 分配给一个任意字符串值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter*>属性<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>用来授权是否可以将控件添加到页上的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter*>

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the control being checked for authorization is a shared control, meaning that it is visible to many or all users of the application, and its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared*> property value is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 指示被检查授权控件是否共享的控制，这意味着它对应用程序的许多或所有用户可见并将其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared*>属性值设置为<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared*>

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether a control is authorized to be added to a page.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，该值指示控件是否有权添加到页。

trans-unit.source: type is .
trans-unit.target: typeis .

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether personalization changes have been made that affect page-level personalization details controlled by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否进行了个性化更改会影响由控制页级个性化设置详细信息， <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control uses the IsCustomPersonalizationStateDirty property internally to track whether any of the page-level personalization data that it manages has changed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件在内部使用 IsCustomPersonalizationStateDirty 属性来跟踪是否有任何它所管理的数据已更改的页级别个性化设置。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: The personalization data changes when users carry out various personalization actions at the page level, such as adding or removing <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, connecting or disconnecting controls, changing the page's layout by moving controls, and other actions.
trans-unit.target: 当用户执行各种级别的页，如添加或删除的个性化设置操作时，将更改个性化数据<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件，连接或断开控件，通过移动控件和其他操作更改页面的布局。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Users can also perform personalization at the control level, which means that they make personalization changes to a specific control, and the changes affect only that control.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 用户还可以执行级别的控制，这意味着它们对特定的控件进行个性化修改，个性化和所做的更改仅影响该控件。

trans-unit.source: An example would be editing the control and changing its title text, or its background color.
trans-unit.target: 示例将编辑控件，并可以更改其标题文本或它的背景色。

trans-unit.source: Control-level personalization does not affect the page-level personalization data tracked by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control, and so the IsCustomPersonalizationStateDirty property value is not changed to `true` when control-level personalization occurs.
trans-unit.target: 控件级别个性化设置不会影响所跟踪的页面级别个性化数据<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件，并因此 IsCustomPersonalizationStateDirty 属性值不会更改为`true`控件级别个性化发生时。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: Although the method is protected and cannot be accessed directly by a caller, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.System%23Web%23UI%23WebControls%23WebParts%23IPersonalizable%23IsDirty%2A> property can be accessed directly by callers, and it returns the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: 尽管该方法受保护并不直接由调用方，访问<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.System%23Web%23UI%23WebControls%23WebParts%23IPersonalizable%23IsDirty%2A>直接由调用方，然后才能访问属性，并返回此属性的值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.System%23Web%23UI%23WebControls%23WebParts%23IPersonalizable%23IsDirty%2A>

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether personalization changes have been made.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，该值指示是否进行了个性化设置更改。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Loads control state data that was saved from a previous page request, and needs to be restored on a subsequent request.
trans-unit.target: 加载的控件状态数据已保存来自前面的页请求，并需要还原在后续请求。

trans-unit.source: The LoadControlState method is helpful for restoring property data that should be persisted across postbacks of a page, even when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 方法可用于还原应在回发期间的页上，保留的属性数据 LoadControlState 即使<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A>属性设置为`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: Contains the persisted state data to be loaded.
trans-unit.target: 包含要加载的保留的状态数据。

trans-unit.source: savedState is not a valid .
trans-unit.target: savedState不是有效。

trans-unit.source: Stores the custom personalization data that has been passed to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control by the personalization objects to be used later during the initialization process.
trans-unit.target: 存储已传递到自定义个性化数据<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>由个性化对象会在初始化过程中使用的控件。

trans-unit.source: The LoadCustomPersonalizationState method provides saved state data in the form of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary> object.
trans-unit.target: LoadCustomPersonalizationState 方法提供的窗体中的已保存的状态数据<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary>

trans-unit.source: This data is eventually used to load personalization data into the Web Parts controls and to perform other initialization tasks.
trans-unit.target: 此数据最终使用加载到 Web 部件控件的个性化数据以及执行其他初始化任务。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is called by a sequence of methods that begins when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.TrackViewState%2A> method initially requests the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> object to supply personalization data to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 开始时的一系列方法调用此方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.TrackViewState%2A>方法最初请求关联<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>对象提供个性化数据到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.TrackViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: You cannot call this method directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 不能在代码中直接调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: You can, however, directly call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.System%23Web%23UI%23WebControls%23WebParts%23IPersonalizable%23Load%2A> method, which itself calls the LoadCustomPersonalizationState method and returns the personalization data.
trans-unit.target: 但是，，可以直接调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.System%23Web%23UI%23WebControls%23WebParts%23IPersonalizable%23Load%2A>方法，后者自身调用 LoadCustomPersonalizationState 方法，并返回个性化数据。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.System%23Web%23UI%23WebControls%23WebParts%23IPersonalizable%23Load%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary"></xref> that contains the state data to be loaded.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary"> </xref> ，其中包含要加载的状态数据。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> object that allows only <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag"></xref> permission and <xref href="System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel"></xref> permission.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref>对象，它仅允许<xref href="System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag"></xref>权限和<xref href="System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel"></xref>权限。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> object that is returned by this property is used during import for type deserialization.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>类型反序列化导入过程中使用此属性返回的对象。</xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> object that allows only <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag"></xref> permission and <xref href="System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel"></xref> permission.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref>对象，它仅允许<xref href="System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag"></xref>权限和<xref href="System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel"></xref>权限。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> object that allows only <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag"></xref> permission and <xref href="System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel"></xref> permission.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref>对象，它仅允许<xref href="System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag"></xref>权限和<xref href="System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel"></xref>权限。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> object returned by this property is used during import for everything except type deserialization.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>导入所有操作都只键入反序列化过程中使用此属性返回的对象。</xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> object that allows only <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag"></xref> permission and <xref href="System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel"></xref> permission.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref>对象，它仅允许<xref href="System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag"></xref>权限和<xref href="System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel"></xref>权限。

trans-unit.source: Moves a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> or server control from one <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> zone to another, or to a new position within the same zone.
trans-unit.target: 将移动<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>或服务器控件从一个<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref>区域到另一个，或到同一区域内的新位置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control uses the MoveWebPart method to move `webPart` to a new location in the same zone, or in a different zone.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件使用 MoveWebPart 方法来移动`webPart`到在同一区域中，或不同区域中的新位置。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: You can call this method directly from code, and it is also invoked when a user moves a control to a new position using various options in the Web Parts user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: 你可以直接从代码中，调用此方法，也会调用时用户将控件移到新位置在 Web 部件用户界面 (UI) 中使用各种选项。

trans-unit.source: A number of conditions must be met before `webPart` can be moved, and most of these are indicated by items listed in the Exceptions section of this topic.
trans-unit.target: 之前，必须满足的条件数`webPart`可以移动，和其中的大部分由本主题的异常部分中列出的项。

trans-unit.source: If `webPart` was not contained in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone to begin with, it cannot be moved into a zone.
trans-unit.target: 如果`webPart`中未包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>区域开始时，不能移入某个区域。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: After the conditions have been met, the following sequence of actions occurs to move `webPart`: 1.
trans-unit.target: 在满足的条件后，操作按以下顺序发生移动`webPart`: 1。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartMoving%2A> method raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartMoving%2A>方法引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartMoving%2A>

trans-unit.source: `webPart` is removed from its current zone (if necessary), and added to its new zone or new position within its current zone.
trans-unit.target: `webPart`从其当前区域 （如有必要），删除和添加到其新的区域或在其当前的区域内的新位置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartMoved%2A> method raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoved> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartMoved%2A>方法引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoved>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoved> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartMoved%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `zoneIndex` of every <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control in both the origin and destination zones is reset to reflect the moved control.
trans-unit.target: `zoneIndex`的每个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>起点和目标区域中的控件重置，以反映移动的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> or other server control being moved.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref>或移动其他服务器控件。

trans-unit.source: The target <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> to which `webPart` is being moved.
trans-unit.target: 目标<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref>到`webPart`将被移。

trans-unit.source: An integer that indicates the index of `webPart` relative to other controls within `zone`.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数，指示的索引`webPart`相对于其他控件内`zone`。

trans-unit.source: webPart or zone is .
trans-unit.target: webPartor zone is .

trans-unit.source: zoneIndex is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: zoneIndex小于零。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.AuthorizeWebPart"></xref> event and invokes a handler for the event, if one exists.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.AuthorizeWebPart"></xref>事件并调用事件处理程序，如果存在。

trans-unit.source: The OnAuthorizeWebPart method is called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized%2A> method, when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control is being checked for authorization to be added to a page.
trans-unit.target: 调用 OnAuthorizeWebPart 方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized%2A>方法，当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件要添加到页面的授权检查。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the OnAuthorizeWebPart method is called, it raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.AuthorizeWebPart> event, and if there is a handler method for the event, it invokes the handler.
trans-unit.target: 当调用 OnAuthorizeWebPart 方法时，将引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.AuthorizeWebPart>事件，并且如果没有为事件处理程序方法，它调用处理程序。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.AuthorizeWebPart>

trans-unit.source: The process of authorizing <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls is an important Web Parts feature.
trans-unit.target: 授权的过程<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件是一个重要的 Web 部件功能。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Every <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or server control that is added to a zone by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control goes through an authorization process to determine whether the control can be added.
trans-unit.target: 每个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>或添加到的区域的服务器控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件将经历授权过程以确定是否可以添加控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: By default, the Web Parts control set does not provide any filtering criteria to prevent controls from being added to a zone.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，Web 部件控件集不提供任何筛选条件，以防止控件添加到区域。

trans-unit.source: But the control set does provide the mechanisms necessary for developers to create their own filtering criteria.
trans-unit.target: 但控件集提供了开发人员创建其自己的筛选条件所需的机制。

trans-unit.source: By using these mechanisms, you can create custom filtering scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用这些机制，可以创建自定义筛选方案。

trans-unit.source: For example, you could create a filter so that, if a user is in an administrator role, certain controls would be added to a zone when the page is rendered, and if the user is in a user role, those controls would not be added.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以创建筛选器，以便如果用户是管理员角色中，某些控件将添加到区域中，当呈现页面，并且如果用户是用户角色中，将不会添加这些控件。

trans-unit.source: The mechanisms for filtering controls during the authorization process are the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A> property on <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized%2A> and OnAuthorizeWebPart methods, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.AuthorizeWebPart> event on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: 在授权过程中筛选控件使用机制<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized%2A>和 OnAuthorizeWebPart 方法和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.AuthorizeWebPart>上的事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.AuthorizeWebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A>

trans-unit.source: To create a filtering scenario, there are essentially two tasks.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建筛选的方案，没有实质上是两个任务。

trans-unit.source: First, you assign strings to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A> property of each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control you want to filter.
trans-unit.target: 首先，你还将字符串转换为分配<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A>每个属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>你想要筛选的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A>

trans-unit.source: These string values can be arbitrary, but they should contain the criteria you want to filter on.
trans-unit.target: 这些字符串值可以是任意的但它们应包含你想要作为筛选依据的条件。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you wanted a given control to be added to a zone only if an administrator user is viewing the page, then you might assign a string value of `admin` to the property.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你想给定的控件要添加到区域才管理员用户正在查看页上，则可以分配的字符串值`admin`的属性。

trans-unit.source: Then you could use the ASP.NET roles feature, and add all users of your site to various roles such as administrator, manager, and user.
trans-unit.target: 然后可以使用 ASP.NET 角色功能，并将你的站点的所有用户都添加到各种角色，例如管理员、 经理和用户。

trans-unit.source: When a page is loading, your filtering code would check what role a user is in, compare it to the authorization filter value on a control being checked, and if (for example) the user is in an administrator role and you had set the control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A> value to `admin`, the control could be added.
trans-unit.target: 当正在加载页面时，筛选代码将检查用户的哪些角色中，将其与要检查的控件上的授权筛选器值比较，如果该用户的管理员角色的是 （例如），并且你已设置的控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A>值赋给`admin`，无法添加控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A>

trans-unit.source: The second step in creating a filtering scenario is to write code to check the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A> property values on <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, and determine whether each control is authorized before it is added to its zone.
trans-unit.target: 创建筛选方案的第二步是编写代码以检查<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A>属性值在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件，并确定每个控件是否已被添加到其区域之前的授权。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A>

trans-unit.source: There are two options for where to place this filtering code.
trans-unit.target: 有两个用于此筛选代码的放置位置选项。

trans-unit.source: The first option is the preferred option for page developers.
trans-unit.target: 第一个选项是页开发人员的首选的选项。

trans-unit.source: You can create a method to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.AuthorizeWebPart> event directly in the Web page server script code, or in a code separation file.
trans-unit.target: 你可以创建一个方法来处理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.AuthorizeWebPart>直接在 Web 页的服务器脚本代码，或单独的代码文件中的事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.AuthorizeWebPart>

trans-unit.source: Associate your method with the event by adding the `OnAuthorizeWebPart` attribute to the tag for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control in the page, as shown in the following sample markup code.
trans-unit.target: 将你的方法与事件相关联通过添加`OnAuthorizeWebPart`属性设为的标记<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控制在页中，如下面的示例标记代码中所示。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: ``` <asp:webpartmanager id="manager1" runat="server" OnAuthorizeWebPart="manager1_AuthorizeWebPart" /> ``` All your custom method has to do is check each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control for the filtering criteria and then, based on the results, assign a Boolean value to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartAuthorizationEventArgs.IsAuthorized%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartAuthorizationEventArgs> object to indicate whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control can be added.
trans-unit.target: ``` <asp:webpartmanager id="manager1" runat="server" OnAuthorizeWebPart="manager1_AuthorizeWebPart" /> ```所有自定义方法都只需是检查每个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制是否满足筛选条件，然后，根据结果，将分配到一个布尔值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartAuthorizationEventArgs.IsAuthorized%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartAuthorizationEventArgs>对象，以指示是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>可以添加控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartAuthorizationEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartAuthorizationEventArgs.IsAuthorized%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The code in the Example section demonstrates how to do this.
trans-unit.target: 示例部分中的代码演示如何执行此操作。

trans-unit.source: The second option for where to place your filtering code is to inherit from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class, and override a method to check the filter criteria.
trans-unit.target: 有关在何处放置筛选代码的第二个选项是继承自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>类，并重写一个方法以检查筛选器条件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: The two methods you can override to do this are the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized%28System.Type%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29?displayProperty=fullName> method or the OnAuthorizeWebPart method.
trans-unit.target: 可以重写以执行此操作的两个方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized%28System.Type%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29?displayProperty=fullName>方法或 OnAuthorizeWebPart 方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized%28System.Type%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Although either method would work, in most cases it is preferable to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized%2A> method, because it provides you with greater programmatic control over the whole authorization process, whereas the OnAuthorizeWebPart method does only one specific task, which is to raise the event and check for a handler.
trans-unit.target: 尽管任何一种方法将起作用，但在大多数情况下它是更可取的方法重写<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized%2A>方法，因为它提供了更多的编程控制对整个授权过程中，而 OnAuthorizeWebPart 方法执行只有一个特定的任务，是引发的事件和处理程序提出的检查。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a code example of a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class that overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized%2A> method, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized%28System.Type%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29?displayProperty=fullName> overload of the method.
trans-unit.target: 有关自定义的代码示例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>类，并重写<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized%2A>方法，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized%28System.Type%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29?displayProperty=fullName>的方法重载。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized%28System.Type%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartAuthorizationEventArgs"></xref> that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartAuthorizationEventArgs"> </xref>包含事件数据。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectionsActivated"></xref> event to indicate that a page and its controls are loaded, and connections on the page have been activated to begin sharing data.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectionsActivated"></xref>事件以指示加载一个页，并且其控件，并且已激活页上的连接以开始共享数据。

trans-unit.source: The OnConnectionsActivated method raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectionsActivated> event after a page has completed the loading process.
trans-unit.target: OnConnectionsActivated 方法将引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectionsActivated>页面完成加载过程后的事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectionsActivated>

trans-unit.source: The method provides a way to add a handler for the event.
trans-unit.target: 该方法提供了一种添加事件的处理程序方法。

trans-unit.source: Page developers can add a custom handler for the event by adding an `OnConnectionsActivated` attribute to the `<asp:webpartmanager>` element in a page, and then assigning a custom method name to the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 页开发人员可以通过添加添加自定义事件处理程序`OnConnectionsActivated`属性设为`<asp:webpartmanager>`页，然后将自定义的方法名称分配到的属性中的元素。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件数据。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectionsActivating"></xref> event to indicate that a page and its controls have loaded, and the process of activating connections can begin.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectionsActivating"></xref>事件以指示已加载一个页，并且其控件，并且可以开始激活连接过程。

trans-unit.source: The OnConnectionsActivating method raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectionsActivating> event, which provides developers with a mechanism for programmatically customizing the process of activating connections.
trans-unit.target: OnConnectionsActivating 方法将引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectionsActivating>事件，开发人员提供一种机制，用于以编程方式自定义激活连接的过程。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectionsActivating>

trans-unit.source: Page developers can add a custom handler for the event by adding an `OnConnectionsActivating` attribute to the `<asp:webpartmanager>` element in a page, and then assigning a custom method name to the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 页开发人员可以通过添加添加自定义事件处理程序`OnConnectionsActivating`属性设为`<asp:webpartmanager>`页，然后将自定义的方法名称分配到的属性中的元素。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件数据。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModeChanged"></xref> event to indicate that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control has completed the process of switching from one display mode to another on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModeChanged"></xref>事件，则指示<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>控件已完成从一种显示模式切换到另一个在网页上的过程。

trans-unit.source: The OnDisplayModeChanged method in its base form simply raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: OnDisplayModeChanged 方法的基形式只引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModeChanged>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModeChanged>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeEventArgs"></xref> that contains event data associated with a changed display mode.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeEventArgs"> </xref>包含与已更改的显示模式相关联的事件数据。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModeChanging"></xref> event to indicate that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control is in the process of switching from one display mode to another on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModeChanging"></xref>事件，则指示<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>控件的过程中从一种显示模式切换到另一个在网页上。

trans-unit.source: The OnDisplayModeChanging method in its base form simply raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModeChanging> event.
trans-unit.target: OnDisplayModeChanging 方法的基形式只引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModeChanging>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModeChanging>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains event data associated with a changing display mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含与不断变化的显示模式相关联的事件数据。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Init"></xref> event, which is the first event in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control life cycle.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Init"></xref>事件，即第一个事件中<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>控件生命周期。

trans-unit.source: The OnInit method calls the base method, which raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Init> event for the control, and then carries out several preparatory steps, such as ensuring that there is only one instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control on a page, and loading personalization data.
trans-unit.target: OnInit 方法调用基方法，将引发<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Init>控件，然后执行几个预备步骤，如确保只有一个实例的事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件在页中，并加载个性化数据。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Init>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件数据。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: There is another <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control on the page
trans-unit.target: 是另一个<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>页上的控件

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender"></xref> event, which occurs just before a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control is rendered on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender"></xref>事件，发生之前<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>控件是否呈现在网页上。

trans-unit.source: The OnPreRender method calls the base method, which raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender> event for the control, and then registers several client scripts that are needed on pages that contain Web Parts controls.
trans-unit.target: OnPreRender 方法调用基方法，将引发<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender>事件控件，然后注册了多个包含 Web 部件的页所需的客户端脚本控制。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件数据。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanged"></xref> event, which occurs after a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control has either been newly selected or had its selection cleared.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanged"></xref>后发生的事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控件或者新选择或清除其选择。

trans-unit.source: The OnSelectedWebPartChanged method raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanged> event, which is typically a point in time where a developer might want to change the appearance of the user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: OnSelectedWebPartChanged 方法将引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanged>事件，这通常是在开发人员可能希望更改用户界面 (UI) 的外观的时间点。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanged>

trans-unit.source: For example, when a new <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control is selected, the Web Parts control set changes the rendering of the newly selected control.
trans-unit.target: 例如，当新<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件被选定，Web 部件控件集更改新选择的控件的呈现。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: After a control's selection is cleared, the rendering is returned to normal.
trans-unit.target: 清除控件的选择之后，呈现返回到正常。

trans-unit.source: After a user selects a particular <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control for editing, the OnSelectedWebPartChanged method is called.
trans-unit.target: 在用户选择特定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>编辑控件中的，调用该 OnSelectedWebPartChanged 方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: When the user finishes editing the control and closes it, with the result that the control's selection is cleared, the OnSelectedWebPartChanged method is called again.
trans-unit.target: 当用户完成编辑控件，并将其关闭，与控件的选择处于未选中状态的结果时，再次调用该 OnSelectedWebPartChanged 方法。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartEventArgs"> </xref>包含事件数据。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanging"></xref> event, which occurs during the process of changing which <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control is currently selected.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanging"></xref>事件，更改其中的过程中发生<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>当前选中控件。

trans-unit.source: The OnSelectedWebPartChanging method raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanging> event, which occurs during the process of changing which <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control is currently selected.
trans-unit.target: OnSelectedWebPartChanging 方法将引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanging>事件，更改其中的过程中发生<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>当前选中控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanging>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control uses this method, and the associated event, to provide an opportunity to cancel a process in which the selected control is changing.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件使用此方法，而且关联的事件，以提供取消进程在其中更改所选的控件的机会。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: For example, the method is called within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BeginWebPartEditing%2A> method, and also within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EndWebPartEditing%2A> method, to provide a way to cancel the process.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在调用该方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BeginWebPartEditing%2A>方法，并还在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EndWebPartEditing%2A>方法，以提供一种方法来取消该过程。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EndWebPartEditing%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BeginWebPartEditing%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a user clicks the cancel verb on a control that is being edited, the control is no longer selected and any editing changes are not saved, because the OnSelectedWebPartChanging method makes it possible to cancel the editing changes.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户单击正在编辑的控件上的取消谓词，控件不再处于选中状态，并且不保存任何编辑更改，因为 OnSelectedWebPartChanging 方法使它能够取消编辑的更改。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The method is similarly called during the methods that begin and end the process of connecting a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control to another control, to enable canceling that process.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 期间的开始和结束连接的过程的方法同样调用方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件添加到另一个控件，以便取消该进程。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Page developers can create a custom handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanging> event by adding the `OnSelectedWebPartChanging` attribute to the `<asp:webpartmanager>` element in declarative page markup, and assigning to the attribute the name of a custom method.
trans-unit.target: 页开发人员可以创建自定义处理程序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanging>通过添加事件`OnSelectedWebPartChanging`属性设为`<asp:webpartmanager>`中声明性页面标记，并将自定义方法的名称分配给该属性的元素。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanging>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCancelEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCancelEventArgs"> </xref>包含事件数据。

trans-unit.source: Raises the base <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Unload"></xref> event and removes the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> instance from a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 对基<xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Unload"></xref>事件并删除<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>在网页上的实例。

trans-unit.source: Event data associated with the removal of the control.
trans-unit.target: 与控件删除关联的事件数据。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdded"></xref> event, which occurs after a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control has been added to a page.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdded"></xref>后发生的事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控件已添加到页。

trans-unit.source: The OnWebPartAdded method is called during the process of adding a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control (or other server control that is added to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone) to a page.
trans-unit.target: 在添加的过程中调用 OnWebPartAdded 方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件 (或添加到其他服务器控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>区域) 到页。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Page developers can create a custom handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdded> event by adding the `OnWebPartAdded` attribute to the <`asp:webpartmanager>` element, and assigning a custom method name to the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 页开发人员可以创建自定义处理程序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdded>通过添加事件`OnWebPartAdded`属性设为`asp:webpartmanager>`元素，并将自定义的方法名称分配给该属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdded>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartEventArgs"> </xref>包含事件数据。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdding"></xref> event, which occurs during the process of adding a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control (or a server or user control) to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> zone.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdding"></xref>事件，添加的过程中发生<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控件 （或的服务器或用户控件），它到<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref>区域。

trans-unit.source: The OnWebPartAdding method raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdding> event to indicate that a control is in the process of being added.
trans-unit.target: 通过以下方法将引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdding>事件，它指示控件正在添加。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdding>

trans-unit.source: The method also provides the option to cancel the adding process.
trans-unit.target: 该方法还提供了选项来取消添加过程。

trans-unit.source: If the control is successfully added, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdded> event follows.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功添加控件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdded>事件遵循。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdded>

trans-unit.source: Page developers can provide a custom handler for the associated event by adding the `OnWebPartAdding` attribute to the `<asp:webpartmanager>` element on a Web page, and then assigning a custom method name to the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 页开发人员可以通过添加为关联的事件提供自定义的处理程序`OnWebPartAdding`属性设为`<asp:webpartmanager>`上 Web 页面中，，然后将自定义的方法名称分配给该属性的元素。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartAddingEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartAddingEventArgs"> </xref>包含事件数据。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosed"></xref> event to signal that a control has been removed from a page.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosed"></xref>事件以发出信号控件已被移除从页。

trans-unit.source: The OnWebPartClosed method raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosed> event to indicate that a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control (or other server or user control) has been successfully closed on a page.
trans-unit.target: 以下方法将引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosed>事件，则指示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件 （或其他服务器或用户控件） 已成功关闭在页面上。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosed>

trans-unit.source: To close a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control means to remove it from a page so that it is not rendered, and also to place it in a special holding object called a page catalog.
trans-unit.target: 若要关闭<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件意味着若要删除从页以便不呈现，并且还将其放在一个特殊持有对象调用页目录。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: A page catalog, which corresponds to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart> control, maintains references to closed <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls for each page.
trans-unit.target: 对应于一个页目录<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart>控制，维护对已关闭的引用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>为每个页的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart>

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart> control is declared on a page within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone> zone, users can switch the page into catalog display mode, and add back to the page any controls that were previously closed.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart>控件声明内的网页<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone>区域，用户可以将页切换到目录的显示模式，并将以前关闭任何控件添加回页面。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart>

trans-unit.source: The OnWebPartClosed method provides an opportunity for developers to create a custom handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosed> event.
trans-unit.target: 以下方法使开发人员创建的自定义处理程序有机会<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosed>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosed>

trans-unit.source: Page developers can add a custom handler for the event by adding an `OnWebPartClosed` attribute to the `<asp:webpartmanager>` element in a page, and then assigning a custom method name to the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 页开发人员可以通过添加添加自定义事件处理程序`OnWebPartClosed`属性设为`<asp:webpartmanager>`页，然后将自定义的方法名称分配到的属性中的元素。

trans-unit.source: One useful task a developer might carry out in this method is to display a placeholder in place of the closed control, complete with a ToolTip that would inform users how to add the control back to the page.
trans-unit.target: 开发人员可能在此方法中执行的一个有用的任务是显示在已关闭的控件的位置的占位符，完成与工具提示将告知用户如何将控件添加回页面。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartEventArgs"> </xref>包含事件数据。
